login.title: Verify your phone number

login.modal_subtitle: Please enter the six-digit verification code that we have sent to your mobile number ending in
login.modal_footer: If you haven't received the code, please check your messages or

steps.title: Choose a Location
steps.desc: Select your pick-up and drop-off locations to find rides that suit your route.

steps.title: Pick-Up-Date
steps.desc: Choose the date and time that works best for your journey.

steps.title: Book Your Car
steps.desc: Confirm your booking and get ready to travel with trusted drivers.

book.convenience_desc: With ViaCars, finding and booking rides has never been easier. Save time, money, and energy while traveling safely with trusted drivers.

convenience.title: Your pick of rides at low prices
convenience.desc: No matter where you're going, by bus or carpool, find the perfect ride from our wide range of destinations and routes at low prices.

convenience.title: Easy booking process
convenience.desc: Booking a ride takes just a few taps. Search, select, and confirm your trip in minutes.

convenience.title: Secure payments
convenience.desc: All transactions are encrypted and secure for your peace of mind.

convenience.title: Verified drivers
convenience.desc: Ride with drivers who are rated and reviewed by the community for safety and reliability.

book.driving_subtitle: Let's make this your least expensive journey ever.

faq.question: How do I book a carpool ride?
faq.answer: You can book a carpool ride on our mobile app, or on blablacar.in. Simply search for your destination, choose the date you want to travel and pick the carpool that suits you best! Some rides can be booked instantly, while other rides require manual approval from the driver. Either way, booking a carpool ride is fast, simple and easy.

faq.question: How much does a ViaCars ride cost?
faq.answer: We accept multiple payment methods including credit/debit cards, digital wallets, and UPI transactions.

faq.question: How do I cancel my carpool ride?
faq.answer: Yes, you can cancel your ride before departure. Cancellation policies may vary based on the driver's preferences.

faq.question: How do I publish a carpool ride?
faq.answer: Yes, every carpool ride is covered under our insurance policy to ensure safety.

faq.question: What are the benefits of travelling by carpool?
faq.answer: Once your booking is confirmed, you can contact your driver via chat or call in the app.

faq.question: How do I start carpooling?
faq.answer: If your driver cancels, we will notify you immediately, and you can book another ride or request a refund.

faq.question: How do I cancel my carpool ride?
faq.answer: Pets are allowed if the driver agrees. Be sure to check with them before booking.

approved.title: Your booking has been successfully confirmed!

publish.title: Publish your ride in just minutes
publish.description: Effortlessly publish your ride in just a few minutes, allowing you to connect with passengers quickly and efficiently. By sharing your journey, you can save on travel costs, reduce your environmental impact, and make your trip more enjoyable. Experience a seamless and hassle-free way to travel while building meaningful connections.

create_account.title: Create a account
create_account.description: Add your profile picture, a few words about you and your phone number to increase trust between members.

publish_ride.title: Publish your ride
publish_ride.description: Specify departure, arrival, ride date, and check our suggested price to attract your first passengers and earn ratings.

accept_booking.title: Accept booking requests
accept_booking.description: Review passenger profiles and accept their requests to ride with you. That's how easy it is to start saving on travel costs!

drive.title: Drive
drive.description: Stay committed to your original plans while maximizing the potential of your journey by filling the empty seats in your car. By sharing the ride, you can save on travel expenses, reduce environmental impact, and enjoy a pleasant and efficient trip.

share.title: Share
share.description: Enhance your travel experience by enjoying great company along the way. Connect with travelers from diverse backgrounds, share stories, and create lasting memories together on a journey you'll never forget.

save.title: Save
save.description: Manage expenses like tolls, gas, electricity, and more with ease. Share costs fairly and transparently with fellow travelers, making your journeys more affordable, efficient, and hassle-free for everyone involved.

testimonials.title: What our drivers are saying
testimonials.description: As a carpool driver, I find this app efficient, user-friendly, and reliable. It simplifies ride-sharing, connects me with passengers, and saves travel costs effectively.

support.title: We're here every step of the way

service.title: At your service 24/7
service.description: Our team is at your disposal to answer any questions by email or social media. You can also have a live chat directly with experienced members.

car.title: Car at your side
car.description: For just 2 €, benefit from the reimbursement of up to 1,500€ of your excess when you publish a ride as a driver on Car.

secure.title: 100% secure information
secure.description: Our team is dedicated to the protection of your data, which is always 100% confidential thanks to monitoring tools, secure navigation and encrypted data.

about_you.title: About you
about_you.description: Dedicated to making travel more convenient and cost-effective, he prioritizes safety, punctuality, and passenger comfort. By providing a reliable and efficient service, he ensures that commuters enjoy a smooth and stress-free journey. His commitment to shared transportation allows passengers to save money while reducing environmental impact. Beyond just a ride, he fosters a sense of community among travelers, encouraging connections and a more enjoyable commuting experience. His dependable service transforms everyday travel into a seamless, shared experience.

preferences.chatty: I'm chatty when I feel comfortable
preferences.smoking: Cigarette breaks outside the car are ok
preferences.music: I'll jam depending on the mood
preferences.pets: I'll travel with pets depending on the animal

passenger_profile.title: Profile
passenger_profile.bio: Making travel more convenient and cost-effective for passengers. With a strong commitment to safety and punctuality, he ensures a smooth and comfortable ride. His reliable service helps commuters share journeys efficiently while fostering a sense of community on the road.
